name: Nature and Wisdom
description:
Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.
(You must have at least 2 Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3404}Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3404}Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."
